name: Tainacan
author: Tainacan.org

sections.description:
Tainacan is an open-source, powerful and flexible digital repository platform for WordPress. Manage and publish your digital collections just as easily as you post to your blog, having all the tools of a professional repository platform. It can be used for the creation of a digital collection, a digital library or a digital repository for your institutional or personal collection.

Tainacan aims to facilitate the activities of organizing, documenting, disseminating and displaying digital objects based on simple and accessible principles of digital curation. The plugin integrates with the WordPress block engine, making it easy to reuse objects for different and varied uses. You can manage and publish your digital collections as easily as posting to your blog. It is versatile and can be used to create a digital collection, a digital library or a digital repository for your institutional or personal collection.

Features

  • “Metadata and Filters”: Use a metadata standard or choose whatever set of metadata you want to describe the items in your collections. Also, choose which metadata will be used as a filter when browsing collections.

  • “Faceted Search”. Browse your collection (and let the public browse it) using a faceted search interface with the filters you have chosen.

  • “Manage Taxonomies”: Manage vocabularies that can be used across all your collections.

  • “Themes”: The Tainacan plugin has its own default theme, which helps you to showcase your collections beautifully and effectively. But it can also work with any WordPress theme, so interface developers can easily add Tainacan-specific features to an existing theme.

  • “API and Interoperability”: Tainacan implements a RESTful API (read and write) to allow other applications to interact with your repository. That way, you can expose your collection in different formats, such as JSON, CSV, HTML and others. If your collection has a specific set of metadata, you can map this metadata to match the patterns you want to use.

  • “Gutenberg blocks”: Tell stories with your collections. Tainacan offers you several Gutenberg blocks so you can present your collections to the public in many different ways!

Getting Started

After installation, you will see a new menu item in your admin panel called “Tainacan”. Click on it to open the Tainacan admin interface.

To get an overview of the main concepts of Tainacan, please visit this page.

Create a collection

Click “New Collection” to create a new collection, use a mapping standard or import it using one of our importers.

Configure your collection

Navigate to the top menu to set your collection up. Create the metadata that items in this collection will have, and choose, from these metadata, which ones are going to be used as a filter.

Add items

Back to the “Items” screen, click “Add new” to create a new item.

Manage and browse your collection

Through this admin interface, you can manage your collection and browse its items using the faceted search interface or advanced search interface.

If you want to visit your collections on the public side of your site, using your current theme, visit http://your-site/collections and you will get the list of your collections.

Set up Taxonomies

You can also have metadata as taxonomies, which you can configure with a set of hierarchical terms of your own vocabulary.

Add links to your menu

Edit your menu and links directly to your collections. Click “Screen options” at the top of the Edit Menu page and enable “Collections”.

If you want to add a link to the list of collections, click the “View all” tab on the Collections box on the left, and then add the first item named “Collections” to the menu.

Faceted search in your theme

To have a fully-featured faceted search in your theme, you can either make it compatible with a few templates or use our Faceted Search Block.

Find out more

  • Visit our official website: https://tainacan.org/
  • Contribute to the source code: https://github.com/tainacan/tainacan
  • Check our documentation Wiki: https://wiki.tainacan.org/
sections.installation:
Upload the files to the plugins directory and activate it. You can also install and activate directly from the admin panel.

If you have Imagick installed on your server, Tainacan will be able to automatically generate a thumbnail from your PDF files. This is desired but not required.
sections.faq:
Where do I report security bugs found in this plugin?

Please report security bugs found in the source code of the Tainacan plugin through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team will assist you with verification, CVE assignment, and notify the developers of this plugin.

short_description: Tainacan is an open-source, powerful and flexible digital repository platform for WordPress.
description:
Tainacan is an open-source, powerful and flexible digital repository platform for WordPress. Manage and publish your digital collections just as easily as you post to your blog, having all the tools of a professional repository platform. Find out more

screenshots.caption: Choose the metadata and filters for your collection
Add items described by your metadata
Set up your item as a file, link or text and attach many types of documents
Browse your collections with a faceted search interface
Navigate through the rich filtering interface
Set up Taxonomies to be used across your repository
Bulk edit as many items as you need quickly
Expose your collection using Tainacan default theme
Use Gutenberg blocks to display your collections in posts and pages
Choose which items will be displayed in your block
Items displayed using a Gutenberg block

tainacan/carousel-items-list.name: tainacan/carousel-items-list
tainacan/carousel-items-list.title: Tainacan Collection's Items Carousel
tainacan/carousel-items-list.description: List items on a Carousel, using search or item selection.

tainacan/item-metadatum.name: tainacan/item-metadatum
tainacan/item-metadatum.title: Tainacan Item Metadatum
tainacan/item-metadatum.description: A single item metadatum, including a label and its value.

tainacan/carousel-terms-list.name: tainacan/carousel-terms-list
tainacan/carousel-terms-list.title: Tainacan Terms Carousel
tainacan/carousel-terms-list.description: List terms on a Carousel, showing their thumbnails or a preview of items.

tainacan/item-metadata-section.name: tainacan/item-metadata-section
tainacan/item-metadata-section.title: Tainacan Item Metadata Section
tainacan/item-metadata-section.description: A single metadata section, including its label and metadata whitin it.

tainacan/collections-list.name: tainacan/collections-list
tainacan/collections-list.title: Tainacan Collections List
tainacan/collections-list.description: Expose collections from your Tainacan repository

tainacan/geocoorinate-item-metadatum.name: tainacan/geocoorinate-item-metadatum
tainacan/geocoorinate-item-metadatum.title: Tainacan Geo Coordinate Item Metadatum
tainacan/geocoorinate-item-metadatum.description: A single item geocoordinate metadatum, containing location information.

tainacan/item-submission-form.name: tainacan/item-submission-form
tainacan/item-submission-form.title: Tainacan Item Submission Form
tainacan/item-submission-form.description: A public item submission form, to allow visitors to create items drafts.

sentFormMessage.default: Thank you. Your item was submitted to the collection.

termsAgreementMessage.default: I agree to submit this item information.

tainacan/item-gallery.name: tainacan/item-gallery
tainacan/item-gallery.title: Tainacan Item Media Gallery
tainacan/item-gallery.description: The media gallery of the item, displaying document, attachments and more.

tainacan/item-metadata-sections.name: tainacan/item-metadata-sections
tainacan/item-metadata-sections.title: Tainacan Item Metadata Sections
tainacan/item-metadata-sections.description: The metadata sections, including their labels and metadata whitin it.

tainacan/item-metadata.name: tainacan/item-metadata
tainacan/item-metadata.title: Tainacan Item Metadata
tainacan/item-metadata.description: The item metadata, including their labels and values.

tainacan/search-bar.name: tainacan/search-bar
tainacan/search-bar.title: Tainacan Search Bar
tainacan/search-bar.description: Set up a custom search bar to redirect to an item's list

tainacan/faceted-search.name: tainacan/faceted-search
tainacan/faceted-search.title: Tainacan Faceted Search
tainacan/faceted-search.description: A full items list faceted search from either the repository, a collection or a term.

tainacan/facets-list.name: tainacan/facets-list
tainacan/facets-list.title: Tainacan Facets List
tainacan/facets-list.description: List facets from a Tainacan Collection or Repository

tainacan/carousel-collections-list.name: tainacan/carousel-collections-list
tainacan/carousel-collections-list.title: Tainacan Collections Carousel
tainacan/carousel-collections-list.description: List collections on a Carousel, displaying either its thumbnail or a preview of its items.

tainacan/related-items-list.name: tainacan/related-items-list
tainacan/related-items-list.title: Tainacan Related Items List
tainacan/related-items-list.description: A set of lists to display items related to a certain item via relationship metadata.

tainacan/items-list.name: tainacan/items-list
tainacan/items-list.title: Tainacan Items List
tainacan/items-list.description: Expose items from your Tainacan collections

tainacan/dynamic-items-list.name: tainacan/dynamic-items-list
tainacan/dynamic-items-list.title: Tainacan Collection's Items List
tainacan/dynamic-items-list.description: Dynamically list items from a Tainacan items search

tainacan/terms-list.name: tainacan/terms-list
tainacan/terms-list.title: Tainacan Terms List
tainacan/terms-list.description: Expose terms from your Tainacan taxonomies

tainacan/metadata-section-description.name: tainacan/metadata-section-description
tainacan/metadata-section-description.title: Tainacan Metadata Section Description
tainacan/metadata-section-description.description: A metadata section description, used to complement information about a metadata section.

tainacan/metadata-section-name.name: tainacan/metadata-section-name
tainacan/metadata-section-name.title: Tainacan Metadata Section Name
tainacan/metadata-section-name.description: A metadata section label, used to identify different metadata sections.
